text: Vasim Mammadaliyev (; August 27, 1942 - October 13, 2019) was an Azerbaijani scientist of oriental studies. He was the dean of theology faculty at Baku State University, chairman of a cathedra of Arabic philology and full member of Azerbaijan National Academy of Sciences. ==References== ==Other websites== * Al-Quran Project includes Vasim Mammadaliyev and Ziya Bunyadov Azerbaijani Quran translation. title: Vasim Mammadaliyev
